content: Below, you can find a list of each of the consumable items scattered throughout the game, as well as their effects. Each item can be found in multiple places, across several chapters so keep an eye out.

Below, you can find a list of each of the consumable items scattered throughout the game, as well as their effects. Each item can be found in multiple places, across several chapters so keep an eye out.
